description: In this course students learn about effectively integrating technology into classroom instruction. This course meets for three evening sessions in a computer laboratory setting. Students are required to take this course concurrently with EDUC 330. P/N only. Offered each semester.
name: Standards and Technology
notes: Open to juniors and seniors only.
Meets only on March 12, March 19, and April 2.
title: Instructional Technology
